name: Digimon League
description:
Similar to RPG Maker, similar to Pokemon, it's Digimon League!
It doesn't have so much right now:

  • Save/Load System (Temporal)
  • Fighting with an Skill and little "minigame" for more damage
  • 7 Digimon (Koromon, Tsunomon, Motimon, Pyokomon, Pukamon, Tokomon and Tanemon, everyone but Tanemon is on your team)
  • Inventory with healing items (HP and PP/MP)
  • Item drop
  • Level up system
  • 3 small maps (One of them is full white so.... i guess just two)
  • A little part of the story

-Controls:

-D-Pad/Arrows: Move

-Shift: Run while moving

-Z: Accept

-X: Cancel/Menu

Well, just 6mb for testing purposes, i hope you like it!
